snippet: The Israeli prime minister and President Obama meet, yet again, shortly after the announcement of another housing project in East Jerusalem.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Israel's decision to give final approval for settlements in geographically sensitive parts of East Jerusalem, as well as timing of the decision; contends both will make it harder, and maybe impossible, to reach two-state solution with Palestinians; warns that Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu's present course is antagonizing everyone.
lead_paragraph: The Israeli prime minister and President Obama meet, yet again, shortly after the announcement of another housing project in East Jerusalem.

headline.seo: Another Israeli Housing Project Threatens a Peace Deal
